verses.text: \w And|strong="H0001"\w* \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* saw this, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w* \w and|strong="H0001"\w* kissing \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w his|strong="H6680"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w physicians|strong="H7495"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w embalm|strong="H2590"\w* \w his|strong="H6680"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w while|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w fulfilling|strong="H4390"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* commands, there \w passed|strong="H4390"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w manner|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* bodies \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w embalmed|strong="H2590"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4713"\w* \w mourned|strong="H1058"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w mourning|strong="H1068"\w* being expired, \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Pharao: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* favour \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H0518"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Pharao:

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w made|strong="H7650"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: thou shalt \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* sepulchre \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* digged \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w myself|strong="H0595"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Chanaan. \w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0001"\w* Pharao \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* according \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H7650"\w* thee \w swear|strong="H7650"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w there|strong="H5927"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Pharao’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w except|strong="H7535"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w herds|strong="H1241"\w*, \w which|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Gessen.

\w He|strong="H1571"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w in|strong="H1571"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w train|strong="H7393"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*: \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w company|strong="H4264"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* threshingfloor \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Atad|strong="H0329"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w situated|strong="H0834"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*: \w where|strong="H0834"\w* celebrating \w the|strong="H0834"\w* exequies \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* vehement \w lamentation|strong="H4553"\w*, \w they|strong="H0834"\w* spent \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Chanaan \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*, \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w great|strong="H3515"\w* \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w*. \w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H2088"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4713"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jacob \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Chanaan, \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* double \w cave|strong="H4631"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* buryingplace, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ephron|strong="H6085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Hethite \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Mambre.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H4714"\w* \w in|strong="H6912"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* company, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H0001"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* being \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* afraid, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* talked \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w another|strong="H0251"\w*: Lest \w perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* remember \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wrong|strong="H7451"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w suffered|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* requite \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0001"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w sent|strong="H6680"\w* \w a|strong="H6680"\w* message \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: Thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w died|strong="H4194"\w*,

\w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* much \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w beseech|strong="H0577"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w forget|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* malice \w they|strong="H3588"\w* practiced \w against|strong="H0413"\w* thee: \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H3541"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w forgive|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*. \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w came|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*: \w and|strong="H5650"\w* worshipping prostrate \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ground \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: We \w are|strong="H5650"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*: can \w we|strong="H3588"\w* resist \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

\w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w thought|strong="H2803"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: \w but|strong="H0859"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* turned \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w might|strong="H4616"\w* exalt \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w present|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* see, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w might|strong="H4616"\w* save \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* feed \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w*. \w And|strong="H3820"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* gently \w and|strong="H3820"\w* mildly.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* all \w his|strong="H1931"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3427"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. \w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* saw \w the|strong="H8141"\w* children \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Ephraim \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H8141"\w* third generation. \w The|strong="H8141"\w* children also \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Machir \w the|strong="H8141"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Manasses \w were|strong="H4714"\w* born \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w Joseph’s|strong="H3130"\w* knees.

\w After|strong="H5921"\w* which \w he|strong="H5921"\w* told \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brethren: God \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w visit|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* death, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w make|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* go \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* this land, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land which \w he|strong="H5921"\w* swore \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Abraham, Isaac, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Jacob.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H7650"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w carry|strong="H5927"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* bones \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w place|strong="H0776"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* died \w being|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H2088"\w* hundred \w and|strong="H1121"\w* ten years \w old|strong="H1121"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w being|strong="H1121"\w* embalmed \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* laid \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H2088"\w* coffin \w in|strong="H0430"\w* Egypt.
